turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi, how can I help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello. I was wondering if you could order me a Cherry Mocha from the Starbucks on Richmond Road, Lexington, Kentucky.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, would you like to add any milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please. Could I just get some normal milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: By normal did you mean 2%?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah. Sorry.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem, would you like whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And could I also get an extra shot of espresso in that?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, and what size would you like that in?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Venti, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it, I'll send that order to the Starbucks on Richmond road, one moment.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Alright.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Did you get the extra serving Espresso?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I have ordered you a Venti Cherry Mocha with 2% milk, whipped cream, and an extra shot of espresso to be picked up at the Starbucks on Richmond road.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Fantastic. Thank you. Cool.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your receipt will be texted to you and your drink will be ready in 5 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Can I help with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks again. Nope, that was it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, enjoy your coffee.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.
